description.value: The whispers of the jungle grant you more diverse access to simple primal magic. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dancing Lights], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Disrupt Undead] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Tanglefoot] as innate primal spells at will. If you chose one of those spells with Wildborn Magic, you can select a new spell for Wildborn Magic.
